recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen, Hukum, Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Support the purchasing process by creating PR/PO and following up on order status.
- Gather and compare vendor quotations to assist in basic evaluation.
- Communicate with suppliers regarding quotation requests, requirement clarifications, and delivery schedules.
- Maintain and update the vendor database and ensure all procurement documents are organized and complete.
- Assist in preparing reports such as PO trackers, monthly summaries, or other supporting documents.
- Handle daily administrative tasks related to procurement activities.
- Support ad hoc tasks or small projects assigned by the procurement team.
- Demonstrate good communication skills, attention to detail, and proficiency in Microsoft Office (especially Excel).
- Final-year student or fresh graduate in Supply Chain, Industrial Engineering, Business, or a related field, with a strong willingness to learn procurement processes end-to-end.
